item.description:
344 inspirational minutes of pure,
uplifting, explosive motivation at the
2010 Film Festival

Brought to you by Healthy Living Magazine



November 13, 2010
Held at Duxbury Performing Arts Center
130 St. George Street Duxbury
$20 per person or bring a friend and pay
$30 for 2 tickets


Hippocrates, the father of modern medicine said "Let thy Food be thy Medicine and thy Medicine be thy Food." Kris Carr, film maker of the film "Crazy Sexy Cancer" is the poster child of this slogan. Read how she transformed her life by becoming a "Healing Junkie." Carr's Film will be featured in this year's Film Fest features 4 full length films composed of 344 inspirational minutes of pure, uplifting, explosive motivation. 344 riveting minutes to open your eyes and better your life. Personally selected by me, your editor, for you. Hope to share them with you at the Duxbury Performing Arts Festival on November 13th. See you there!

For more information to go: http://www.healthyliv...
item.name: 344 inspirational minutes of pure, uplifting, explosive motivation-Film Festival
